subject: College World Series
lead_paragraph: Jackie Vasquez hit a three-run homer in the third inning, leading Arizona State to a 3-1 victory against Alabama and its first trip to the Women’s College World Series finals, in Oklahoma City. In the best-of-three championship, which begins Monday, the Sun Devils will face fifth-seeded Texas A&M, which beat top-seeded Florida, 1-0.
